text: The Togolese Football Federation (; FTF) is the governing body of football in Togo. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1960. It became a member of CAF in 1963 and FIFA in 1964. Category:1960 establishments in Africa Category:Football governing bodies in Africa Category:Sport in Togo
title: Togolese Football Federation
